title: Women in Australia 1900-1990: yrs 7-10
creator_credit: Classroom Video Productions and Cathy Miller
brief_description: A discussion starter which looks at: changes in attitudes towards Australian women since 1900 and historical filmclips, contemporary footage and interviews showing women’s different roles and images.
